cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotae

sentence.kanji: 彼はその問題の答えが分からない。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sono mondai no kotae ga wakaranai
sentence.english: He doesn't know the answer to the problem.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seisaku

sentence.kanji: 新しい政策はあまり良いとは思えません。
sentence.romaji: atarashii seisaku ha amari ii to ha omoemasen
sentence.english: I don't think the new policy is very good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's himitsu

sentence.kanji: これは秘密です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha himitsu desu
sentence.english: This is a secret.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suuji

sentence.kanji: 数字は苦手です。
sentence.romaji: suuji ha nigate desu
sentence.english: I'm not good with numbers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sasou

sentence.kanji: 彼女をデートに誘った。
sentence.romaji: kanojo wo de-to ni sasota
sentence.english: I asked her out on a date.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okusan

sentence.kanji: 彼の奥さんはきれいな方です。
sentence.romaji: kare no okusan ha kirei na kata desu
sentence.english: His wife is beautiful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minasama

sentence.kanji: 皆様、こんにちは。
sentence.romaji: minasama konnichiha
sentence.english: Hello everyone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mayou

sentence.kanji: 道に迷いました。
sentence.romaji: michi ni mayoimashita
sentence.english: I lost my way.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meiwaku

sentence.kanji: 人に迷惑をかけてはいけません。
sentence.romaji: hito ni meiwaku wo kakete ha ikemasen
sentence.english: You shouldn't cause trouble for other people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikyuu

sentence.kanji: 地球は丸い。
sentence.romaji: chikyuu ha marui
sentence.english: The earth is round.

cards.english: inner part, the back, inner chamber
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oku

sentence.kanji: はさみは机の奥にあった。
sentence.romaji: hasami ha tsukue no oku ni ata
sentence.english: The scissors were at the back of the desk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's enpitsu

sentence.kanji: 鉛筆を貸して下さい。
sentence.romaji: enpitsu wo kashite kudasai
sentence.english: Please lend me a pencil.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hako

sentence.kanji: この箱は重い。
sentence.romaji: kono hako ha omoi
sentence.english: This box is heavy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honbako

sentence.kanji: 雑誌を本箱に入れました。
sentence.romaji: zashi wo honbako ni iremashita
sentence.english: I put the magazine in the bookcase.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuutou

sentence.kanji: その手紙を封筒に入れた。
sentence.romaji: sono tegami wo fuutou ni ireta
sentence.english: I put that letter in an envelope.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakezan

sentence.kanji: 弟は掛け算を習っている。
sentence.romaji: otouto ha kakezan wo narate iru
sentence.english: My little brother is learning his multiplication tables.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utsusu

sentence.kanji: 机を窓の傍に移しました。
sentence.romaji: tsukue wo mado no soba ni utsushimashita
sentence.english: I moved the desk near the window.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouwa

sentence.kanji: 私の両親は昭和生まれです。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ryoushin ha shouwaumare desu
sentence.english: My parents were born in the Showa era.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akikaze

sentence.kanji: 秋風が気持ちいいね。
sentence.romaji: akikaze ga kimochi ii ne
sentence.english: The autumn wind feels good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukusuu

sentence.kanji: 複数のレポートをひとつにまとめています。
sentence.romaji: fukusuu no repo-to wo hitotsu ni matomete imasu
sentence.english: I have put several reports together in one.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tensuu

sentence.kanji: 今回はテストの点数が悪かった。
sentence.romaji: konkai ha tesuto no tensuu ga warukata
sentence.english: My test score this time was bad.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maisuu

sentence.kanji: コピーの枚数を数えてください。
sentence.romaji: kopi- no maisuu wo kazoete kudasai
sentence.english: Please count the number of copies.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinri

sentence.kanji: 最近、銀行の金利が少し上がった。
sentence.romaji: saikin ginkou no kinri ga sukoshi agata
sentence.english: Recently, the bank's interest rates were raised.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rishi

sentence.kanji: 借金に利子をつけて返したの。
sentence.romaji: shakin ni rishi wo tsukete kaeshita no
sentence.english: He returned the debt with interest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisuu

sentence.kanji: 最近はテレビを見る回数が減りました。
sentence.romaji: saikin ha terebi wo miru kaisuu ga herimashita
sentence.english: I watch TV less frequently these days.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiritsu

sentence.kanji: 私立の大学は学費が高い。
sentence.romaji: shiritsu no daigaku ha gakuhi ga takai
sentence.english: Tuition for the private university is expensive.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touki

sentence.kanji: 次の冬季オリンピックは2年後です。
sentence.romaji: tsugi no touki orinpiku ha 2 nengo desu
sentence.english: The next Winter Olympics will be in two years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shorui

sentence.kanji: 書類を10枚コピーしました。
sentence.romaji: shorui wo juumai kopi- shimashita
sentence.english: I made ten copies of the document.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunrui

sentence.kanji: これらの本を分類してください。
sentence.romaji: korera no hon wo bunrui shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please classify these books.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zei

sentence.kanji: これ以上税が上がると生活できないね。
sentence.romaji: kore ijou zei ga agaru to seikatsu dekinai ne
sentence.english: If tax goes up any further, we will not be able to make a living.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wafuu

sentence.kanji: 夕食に和風パスタを作ったよ。
sentence.romaji: yuushoku ni wafuu pasuta wo tsukuta yo
sentence.english: I made Japanese-style pasta for supper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yawaragu

sentence.kanji: この曲を聞くと気持ちが和らぎます。
sentence.romaji: kono kyoku wo kiku to kimochi ga yawaragimasu
sentence.english: When I hear this tune, I feel at ease.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's washiki

sentence.kanji: あの家のトイレは和式です。
sentence.romaji: ano uchi no toire ha washiki desu
sentence.english: The toilet in that house is Japanese style.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hidarikiki

sentence.kanji: 私の息子は左利きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi no musuko ha hidarikiki desu
sentence.english: My son is left-handed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iten

sentence.kanji: 彼の会社は移転したよ。
sentence.romaji: kare no kaisha ha iten shita yo
sentence.english: His company relocated.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiku

sentence.kanji: 彼女は気が利いている。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ki ga kiite iru
sentence.english: She's very thoughtful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yousu

sentence.kanji: 彼女の様子を見てきます。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no yousu wo mite kimasu
sentence.english: I'm going to see how she's doing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagoyaka

sentence.kanji: 彼らは和やかに食事をした。
sentence.romaji: karera ha nagoyaka ni shokuji wo shita
sentence.english: They ate peacefully.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shousuu

sentence.kanji: その計画に反対の人はほんの少数だったよ。
sentence.romaji: sono keikaku ni hantai no hito ha honno shousuu data yo
sentence.english: Only a very few people opposed the plan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaitou

sentence.kanji: アンケートに回答しました。
sentence.romaji: anke-to ni kaitou shimashita
sentence.english: I answered the questionnaire.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koutou

sentence.kanji: 人間は高等な生物と言われている。
sentence.romaji: ningen ha koutou na seibutsu to iwarete iru
sentence.english: It is said that humans are advanced creatures.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joutou

sentence.kanji: 上等なワインを飲んだの。
sentence.romaji: joutou na wain wo nonda no
sentence.english: We drank good wine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doutou

sentence.kanji: 彼には大学生と同等の学力があります。
sentence.romaji: kare ni ha daigakusei to doutou no gakuryoku ga arimasu
sentence.english: He has the same academic ability as university students.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tesuu

sentence.kanji: お手数ですがよろしくお願いします。
sentence.romaji: otesuu desu ga yoroshiku onegai shimasu
sentence.english: Sorry to trouble you, but please take care of it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitoshii

sentence.kanji: 私は株の知識がないに等しいです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kabu no chishiki ga nai ni hitoshii desu
sentence.english: I have almost no knowledge of stocks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iinkai

sentence.kanji: 明日、委員会が開かれます。
sentence.romaji: ashita iinkai ga hirakaremasu
sentence.english: The committee meeting will be held tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iin

sentence.kanji: 彼は委員に選ばれました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha iin ni erabaremashita
sentence.english: He was elected to the committee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nisuu

sentence.kanji: 今月は出勤日数が多いです。
sentence.romaji: kongetsu ha shukin nisuu ga ooi desu
sentence.english: I'm working many days this month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tasuu

sentence.kanji: その仕事に多数の応募があったよ。
sentence.romaji: sono shigoto ni tasuu no oubo ga ata yo
sentence.english: There were a lot of applications for the job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's samazama

sentence.kanji: その都市には様々な人種が集まっているわ。
sentence.romaji: sono toshi ni ha samazama na jinshu ga atsumate iru wa
sentence.english: There are a lot of different ethnic groups in this city.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touan

sentence.kanji: 今から答案を集めます。
sentence.romaji: ima kara touan wo atsumemasu
sentence.english: I'll collect the answer sheets now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saisan

sentence.kanji: コストがこんなに高くては採算が取れません。
sentence.romaji: kosuto ga konnani takakute ha saisan ga toremasen
sentence.english: When the costs are so high, profit can't be made.
